channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Missing tree, 4th March
item.description:
There was a well established tree which was blown over a few years ago and has not been replaced. Three trees have been replaced in the Avenue recently but this one appears to be forgotten. It leaves a gap in the tree lined Avenue. Outside number 23.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 20 Jersey Avenue, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Blocked drain, 4th March
item.description:
The drain in the picture is to the far right as you enter the car park, and is completely blocked.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 15 Peter Pennell Close, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Poor condition caravan blocking pavement, 4th March
item.description:
An old caravan has appeared on the street but nobody seems to own it. It is in very poor condition and has been left half on road and half on pavement, not secured by the corner steadies just left on the jockey wheel.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 3a Marsh Drive, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: 2 large pot holes, 4th March
item.description:
2 large long pot holes needs sorting out please

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 2 Lobleys Drive, Hucclecote
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Potholes in north bound carriageway, 4th March
item.description:
Ther are large potholes developing on this stretch of the north bound carriageway
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): M5, Hucclecote

item.title: Huge amount of litter all the way along, 4th March
item.description:
The litter along this stretch of dual carriageway is a disgrace
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): Hawthorn Nurseries Elm Garden Drive, The Reddings

item.title: Littered, 4th March
item.description:
There is a horrendous volume of litter along the slip road from the Golden Valley By-pass down to the junction roundabout.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): A40, Cheltenham

item.title: Red traffic light not working, 4th March
item.description:
On the north side of the southbound road, the red light is out
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): Arkle House, 11 Moorend Park Road, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Fixed job has become unfixed!, 4th March
item.description:
The spot-filled job of original pothole has crumbled and formed at least 2 holes in the carriageway again. The image doesn’t show it clearly but my car wheels definitely locate the holes! And you can see the grit where the surface has crumbled! ///chase.inch.tidy

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 15 Unwin Road, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Flooding on highway, 4th March
item.description:
The drain in the gutter outside the Tithe Barn is permanently flooding. The crossing and adjacent footpath is used by many pedestrians, including a high proportion of older people and young children attending the pre-school or going to from school. It has been unresolved for many many months. There is a great deal of soapy suds in evidence. Does the adjacent car wash have permission to discharge to the public drainage system?
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): Bishops Cleeve Former Station Yard Stoke Road, Bishops Cleeve
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Vehicle dumped since december, 4th March
item.description:
This car Reg: YG63 LTT , Citreon Ds Grey has not moved since end of October 2022. No one knows who's it or looked at it. Untaxed end December 2022, Uninsured no MOT since September 2022.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 15 Saint Pauls Walk, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Abandoned met at work, signs Road narrowed, 4th March
item.description:
These signs have been here for at least a week. The roadworks I can’t remember. can someone pick them up please

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 17 Brooklyn Road, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

On the path to Old Pates Field. Please could this be cleaned up? Thank you

item.title: Large metal object in lake, 3rd March
item.description:
Next to the bridge nearest the school on the side of the bridge with the swan sculpture. Looks shallow enough to cause injury to swans/other wildlife if they swim over it.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 5 Albemarle Gate, Cheltenham

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 267 Priors Road, Prestbury

item.title: Pedestrian crossing traffic lights not working, 1st March
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): Richmond West Approach Drive, Cheltenham

item.title: 100s of bottles, cans, fast food wrappers, plastic in roadside ditches, 1st March
item.description:
This rubbish has been accumulating for years in the ditches either side of the B4213 and A38. It's too dangerous for individuals to clear up. This accumulation will be dangerous to wildlife and ultimately to humans. It makes us look like a 3rd world country
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): B4213, Deerhurst
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Noisy manhole cover, 28th February
item.description:
Some manholes were fixed last week. But one man hole ( roughly outside number 21 greenways) hasn't been repaired. When people drove over the manhole it's so noisy and I can it inside my house. Please can this be fixed
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 49 Greenways, Hucclecote
Report on FixMyStreet
